38.eng-name: The Book of Manners and Etiquette

hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah reported that a child was born to a person from the Ansar and he made up his mind to give him the name of Muhammad. He came to Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) and, asked him (about it), whereupon he said:The Ansar have done well to give the name (to your children) after my name, but do not give them the kunya after my kunya

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ التَّكَنِّي، بِأَبِي الْقَاسِمِ وَبَيَانِ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنَ الأَسْمَاءِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Taking The Kunyah Abul-Qasim, And The Names Which Are Recommended
